system.description: When you or a friendly creature in the range of your Commanding Presence ability takes the Attack action for the first time against a creature each turn, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw against a DC of 8 + your Charisma modifier + your proficiency bonus. If it fails, it must use its reaction to move at least half its movement speed away from its current position. This movement is considered a use of the Disengage action and as such does not normally provoke attacks of opportunity.
